Author: extiles
Text: God I wish I had something to say to help you fight this because I'm starting to slip into restricting again for the same reasons. It hurts like hell to compare yourself to someone else who has what you want. Right now I've basically just been repeating to myself over and over in my brain that she's not better than me, she's just different. Just trying to force myself to accept that different doesn't mean better. It's hard, and so damn embarrassing to think that some guy can cause a relapse. But our disorders aren't logical, and it just sucks. I'm sorry.
